transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello, Savita mam baat kar rahi hai.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello yes.
Executive: Savita mam baat kar rahi hai.
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Hello. Hanji mam. Mam ha good morning mam. Mai Sumit ji baat kar rahi hu mam Sri Industries Raipur se.
Customer: Good morning aap kahan se baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Sri Industries Raipur se baat kar rahi hu aap sun pa rahe hain mam. Sri Industries se.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aap Savita mam hi baat kar rahi hain kya?
Customer: Ji mam bataiye. Nahi mai Savita baat kar rahi hu aapke account manager mam.
Executive: Ha nahi isliye maine aapko call kiya. Actually kya hai mai abhi Shreya mam ko call kar rahi thi. To uske baad fir maine dekha ki nahi abhi change ho gaye hain to fir mai aapko call kar rahi hu. Okay okay. Hai na beech mein. Ha abhi maine aapko kabhi call hi nahi kiya mam matlab abhi. Wo actually mam kya hai na ye na bahut time se issue chal raha hai aaj fir se wahi complaint aa rahi hai ki leads nahi mil raha hai.
Customer: Leads nahi mil rahi aapko?
Executive: Matlab kal bhi leads nahi the aaj bhi leads nahi hai matlab aisa nahi mil rahi aapko. Hmm hmm. Ha matlab humko kyuki aisa hai ki jin products pe deal karte hain na basically wo sab cheezein listing policy ko to humne na upload kiya hai apne catalog se aur na hi hum wo supply karte hain to us type ke dikh rahe hain irrelevant bol dijiye aap hai na. Agar wo dikhai de rahi hai to zahir si baat hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai. Mai samajh gayi. Mai ek meeting ka link send kar rahi hu proper check karte kya issue aa raha hai theek hai.
Executive: Ha ha sure mam. Okay thank you mam aap bhejiye mam. Ek second ye aapne email id na phone pe hi karega theek hai. Email id Sri Industries. One minute one minute. Sri.mktg365@gmail.com wala hai mam.
Customer: Ek second. Batati hu aapko ek second.



Executive: Ye sri.mktg365 correct mam?
Customer: Yes mam. Actually it's been a long time mam we are facing the same issue. We are unable to find the. Ye number whatsapp mein hai aapka?
Customer: Yes mam.
Executive: Theek hai mai aapko whatsapp pe send karti hu meeting.

Executive: Ek baar number batayenge mam apna?
Customer: 79744 79744 4 29773
Executive: 29773
Customer: 79744 39773

Executive: Theek hai mam dekhiyega whatsapp pe maine aapko hi ka message kiya hai.
Customer: Ji mam theek hai.
Executive: Join karu mam?
Customer: Ha kariye mam. Aise click on question.

Executive: Hanji. I'm sharing the screen now.

Executive: Are you able to see my screen?
Customer: Theek hai theek hai theek hai. To mam aapka na ye case mujhe recently assign hua hai kuch din pehle to mai apne senior ko bhi sath mein assign kar rahi hu. Ye hamare senior manager hai Sunil sir. Okay ek second.

Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Ha to mujhe apni screen present kijiye.
Executive: Show my screen ha.

Executive: Okay mam aapne ek second ha. Apna mute kholiyega aap jo ha mute open kijiye ga yahan se. Mam actually kya hai na isme na meri aawaz na thodi clear nahi hai.
Customer: Aawaz nahi jaati kya?
Executive: Nahi nahi aawaz aati hai but yahan pe kuch aur log bhi hai jo na matlab already work kar rahe hain. Achcha kuch aur log bhi hai.
Customer: Ha ha kyuki hum wo bhi call hi baat karte hain matlab screen to karte hain sath mein. Agar aap wo bhi call kar de to sahi hai otherwise ek baar ek isko na dekh sakte hain aisa kuch issue hai.
Executive: Theek hai ek second.

Executive: Matlab aapke jo bhi karna hai wo kar le aur jo mujhe karna hai hamari taraf se wo kar le. Ha ha theek hai mai ek kaam karti hu. Apna panel kholiye. Sorry. Panel IndiaMART ka panel.
Executive: Panel isme jaiye. Mai aapki na call sir mai aapki call na sir ko transfer kar deti hu. Theek hai. Taki proper discussion ho sake. Ha ha ha. Ha ha line pe rahiye.


Executive: Mam mai aapke na same number pe dobara call back karti hu jo ye aapne mujhe whatsapp wala diya hai. Theek hai. Ek kaam kare mam ab ek minute ek minute ye aap bolenge to mujhe isme thodi si aawaz aa rahi hai to isi pe kar leti hu ek minute ek baar iske hai na thodi si aapko dikkat na ho. Aaram se. Theek hai ek minute boliye. Clear aa jayega aawaz ab side dikhaungi.
Executive: Aawaz sun pa rahi hai na aap?
Executive: Mam conference pe le lijiye fir uske baad. Koi issue nahi hai mam mai na ek minute mam aapko call back kar rahi hu screen aap aise rakhiyega aapko mai call back kar rahi hu sir ki taraf se. Koi issue nahi hai. Ha kya mam. Sorry. Ha suniye hoga koi issue nahi hai. Ha mai call call kar rahi hu aapko. matlab ha. Bas ek minute ek minute dijiye.
Executive: Chalna lag jayega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough buyleads.

- Customer facing the issue for a long time.



Resolution:

- Executive shared meeting link on WhatsApp.

- Executive transferred the call to senior manager.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back to the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, meeting, transfer call
